restructuring also includes the departure of Sergey Brin from the management team. Sergey Brin 's new role will be far less central to Google's core operations, and he will have the title of "co-founder." Sergey Brin has decided to devote his time and energy to strategic projects, Eric Schmidt wrote in the Google blog.
